name: Fractal Replication
description: Summon two exact copies of an allied minion nearby it.

name: Dampening Wave
description: Give a minion "This cannot counterattack".

name: Flash Reincarnation
description: The next minion you play this turn costs 2 less. Deal 2 damage to it when played.

name: Diretide Frenzy
description: Give a minion +1/+0 and Frenzy.

name: Tremor
description: Stun enemies in a 2x2 area.

name: Mana Burn
description: Dispel spaces nearby your General.

name: Greater Fortitude
description: Give a minion +2/+1.

name: Earth Sphere
description: Heal your General for 9.

name: Bounded Lifeforce
description: Your General becomes 10/10.

name: Amplification
description:
Give a minion "Grow: +2/+2".
Grow allies with Grow.

name: Metamorphosis
description: Transform enemy minions into Magma until your next turn.

name: Plasma Storm
description: Destroy minions with 3 or less Attack in a 3x3 area.

name: Chrysalis Burst
description: Summon an Egg of each allied minion on the space directly behind that minion.

name: Natural Selection
description: Destroy a minion with the lowest Attack.

name: Mind Steal
description: Your action bar becomes a copy of your opponent's action bar.

name: Egg Morph
description: Transform a minion into an Egg of itself. If it is already an Egg, hatch it instead.

name: Kinetic Equilibrium
description: Deal 2 damage to minions in a 3x3 area and give allied minions in that area +2/+0.

name: Bonechill Barrier
description: Summon three joined Ice Barriers.

name: Gravity Well
description: Summon four joined Frost Wells.

name: Blazing Spines
description: Summon two joined Frigid Spines.

name: Chromatic Cold
description: Dispel a space. If there is an enemy on that space, deal 2 damage to it.

name: Flash Freeze
description: Deal 1 damage to a minion and Stun it.

name: Frostfire
description: Give a minion +3/+0. If it is Vespyr, give it +3/+3 instead.

name: Avalanche
description: Deal 4 damage to units on your starting side of the battlefield and Stun them.

name: Boundless Courage
description: Give an allied minion +2/+0. This turn, give it "This takes no damage".

name: Mesmerize
description: Deal 3 damage to enemy minions on a column and Stun them.

name: Mark of Solitude
description: Give a minion "This cannot attack Generals". It becomes 6/6.

name: Aspect of the Fox
description: Transform a minion into a Fox Ravager.

name: Aspect of the Wyrm
description: Put a copy of a minion into its owner's action bar and transform that minion into a Whyte Wyrm.

name: Aspect of the Mountains
description: Transform a minion into a Seismic Elemental and deal 5 damage to enemy minions nearby it.

name: Polarity
description: Swap a minion's Attack and Health.

name: Hailstone Prison
description: Return a minion to its owner's action bar.

name: Spirit of the Wild
description: Activate allied units on your opponent's starting side of the battlefield.

name: Cryogenesis
description: Deal 4 damage to a minion. Draw a Vespyr.

name: Blink
description:
This card cannot be replaced and disappears at the end of your turn.
Teleport an allied minion up to 2 spaces.

name: Backstep
description: Teleport an allied minion to the space directly behind your General. Put a Blink into your action bar.

name: Augury
description: Draw a card. You can replace two additional cards this turn.

name: Cataclysm
description: You can only play this card if you've played at least three other cards this turn. Deal 5 damage to all minions.

name: Anachronize
description: Destroy minions that were summoned since your last turn.

name: Drain Morale
description: Give all minions -1/-0.

name: Mementos
description: Summon two joined Mementos.

name: Skywind Glaives
description:
Your General has +1/+0.
Allied minions nearby your General have +2/+0.

name: Sunstone Bracers
description: Your General has +1/+0.

name: Arclyte Regalia
description:
Your General has +2/+0.
The first time your General takes damage with this equipped each turn, reduce that damage by 2.

name: Mask of Shadows
description: Your General has +1/+0 and Backstab: 3.

name: Cyclone Mask
description: Your General has Ranged.

name: Bloodrage Mask
description: When you play a spell, your General deals 1 damage to the enemy General.

name: Staff Of Y'kir
description:
Your General has +2/+0.
When this is destroyed, shuffle a copy of it into your deck.

name: Wildfire Ankh
description: Your General has Blast.

name: Hexblade
description:
Your General has +3/+0.
When your General damages an enemy, set that enemy's Attack to 1 until the end of the next turn.

name: Soul Grimoire
description: Your General has an additional +2/+0 for each unit that is destroyed.

name: Horn of the Forsaken
description: When your General deals damage, summon a Wraithling on a random space nearby them.

name: Spectral Blade
description:
Your General has +2/+0.
When your General destroys a minion, heal your General for 1.

name: Adamantite Claws
description:
Your General has +3/+0.
This cannot lose durability during your turn.

name: Twin Fang
description: Your General has an additional +1/+0 for each time an ally takes damage.

name: Iridium Scale
description: Your General has Frenzy.

name: Snowpiercer
description:
Your General has +3/+0.
When your General attacks a minion, deal 1 damage to the enemy General.

name: Coldbiter
description: At the end of your turn, your General deals 2 damage to nearby enemy minions.

name: Winterblade
description:
Your General has +1/+0.
When this is destroyed, give your General "This takes no damage" until your next turn.

description:
